name: High Protein Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 2 oz Goodles high-protein noodles (or any protein pasta)
¼ cup shredded cheese of choice (cheddar, mozzarella, or blend)
instructions: Cook pasta separately according to package directions; drain and set aside
In a blender, combine cottage cheese, milk, and seasonings; blend until smooth and creamy
Pour blended sauce into a saucepan over low heat
Add shredded cheese and whisk until melted and smooth
Fold in the cooked pasta and stir until fully coated and creamy
